name: Fishing the Abyss
description:
A strange tide has brought horrifying creatures to the seaside town of Innsmouth. A lone seaman guards the docks at night with nothing but his trusty fishing rod.

Each night you must cast your hook into the cold sea and quickly reel in some fish. As they are launched in the air, grab them with your hook and then shoot them at the monsters roaming the sky.

You just need to survive the night (indicated by your pocket watch in the top right) and at the end of each night you can upgrade one of your abilities.

Controls:

  • Movement: A and D or ← and →
  • Jumping: W or Up Arrow
  • Fishing: Left Mouse Button
